name: part_000
file: tmp_【#沙花叉クロヱ生誕LIVE】シャチ爆誕！初ゲストあり！【沙花叉クロヱ⧸ホロライブ】 [_rgeHcQu0Tc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Intro sequence for Sakamata Chloe's Birthday Live, featuring a slot machine theme and various animations.
Sakamata Chloe performs the song 'Love Letter' on stage.

subtitles.original: #沙花叉クロヱ生誕祭LIVE
subtitles.english: #SakamataChloeBirthdayLIVE

subtitles.original: さん！
subtitles.english: Three!

subtitles.original: にー！
subtitles.english: Two!

subtitles.original: いち！
subtitles.english: One!

subtitles.original: ラブレター
subtitles.english: Love Letter

subtitles.original: 初めまして 大好きな音楽へ
subtitles.english: Nice to meet you, my beloved music.

subtitles.original: ずっと考えてたこと
subtitles.english: Something I've been thinking about for a long time,

subtitles.original: どうか聞いてほしくて
subtitles.english: I wanted you to listen to it somehow.

subtitles.original: (伝えたいことがあるんです)
subtitles.english: (There's something I want to tell you.)

subtitles.original: ちょっと照れ臭いけれど
subtitles.english: It's a bit embarrassing, but

subtitles.original: ずっと想っていたこと
subtitles.english: it's something I've always felt.

subtitles.original: こんなお手紙に込めて
subtitles.english: I put it into this letter,

subtitles.original: (届いてくれますように)
subtitles.english: (hoping it reaches you.)

subtitles.original: どんな時もあなたの 言葉、声を聴いているだけで
subtitles.english: No matter when, just by listening to your words and voice,

subtitles.original: 力が湧いてくるんだ
subtitles.english: strength wells up within me.

subtitles.original: ねえ笑っていたいよどんな時も
subtitles.english: Hey, I want to keep smiling no matter what.

subtitles.original: でも辛いくらい痛い日もある
subtitles.english: But there are days that hurt so much it's hard.

subtitles.original: けどね あなたに触れるだけで気付けば
subtitles.english: But you know, just by being close to you, I realize

subtitles.original: この世界が色鮮やかになる 花が咲くように
subtitles.english: that this world becomes colorful, like flowers blooming.

subtitles.original: 笑って泣いてどんな時だって
subtitles.english: Laughing, crying, at any time,

subtitles.original: 選んでいいんだいつでも自由に
subtitles.english: you're free to choose however you want.

subtitles.original: 今日はどんなあなたに出会えるかな
subtitles.english: I wonder what kind of you I'll meet today.

subtitles.original: この世界が終わるその日まで 鳴り続けていて
subtitles.english: Until the day this world ends, please keep on ringing out.

subtitles.original: いつもあなたのことを求めてしまうんだ
subtitles.english: I always find myself seeking you.

subtitles.original: (踊り出したくなる時も)
subtitles.english: (Even when I want to start dancing,)

subtitles.original: (爆発しちゃいそうな時も)
subtitles.english: (even when I feel like I'm about to explode.)

subtitles.original: 救われたんだ 支えられてきたんだ
subtitles.english: I've been saved, I've been supported.

subtitles.original: (心が動かされるんです)
subtitles.english: (My heart is moved,)

subtitles.original: (心が満たされていくんです)
subtitles.english: (my heart is being filled.)

subtitles.original: ねえもっと触れていたいよ ずっとそばにいてほしいよ
subtitles.english: Hey, I want to feel you more, I want you by my side forever.

subtitles.original: いつまでも大好きなあなたが 響いていますように
subtitles.english: I hope you, whom I'll love forever, keep resonating.
